1. **Screening**: Ensure the patient has no contraindications to receiving the flu vaccine,2001), including:
	* Allergic reactions to eggs or latex (some vaccines contain egg proteins or use latex in their packaging)
	* History of Guillain-Barré Syndrome (GBS) within 40 years after receipt of an influenza vaccine2022)
	* Concurrent febrile illness (>38°C /100.4°F) (delay vaccination until recovery)

* Prepare necessary equipment:
	+ Vaccine vial or pre-filled syringe with correct dosage and formulation (age-specific)
	+ Needle (sterile,usually 22-25 gauge) 
	+ Sterile alcohol pad or disinfectant swab 
	+ Band-Aid or bandage 
	+ Vaccine storage container/kit with proper disposal system (for expired vaccine)
